items.sentence: I'm sorry, but I can't accept such an expensive gift.
The new chair that I just bought is very comfortable.
What kind of person would you like to get married to?
I don't know where either of Tom's parents were born.
My grandfather's jazz band has sold a lot of records.
Tom was able to buy both of the books that he wanted.
Maybe I'm unhappy, but I don't intend to kill myself.
It might not be as difficult as you think to do that.
How did you know that Tom wasn't planning to do that?
One of Rome's most famous landmarks is the Colosseum.
